title: News regarding Velocity Motors
story_body:
Velocity Motors Appoints New Regional Sales Director for Southwest Territory

Velocity Motors (NASDAQ: VELO) announced today the appointment of Marcus Chen as Regional Sales Director for its Southwest territory, covering Arizona, New Mexico, Nevada, and Southern California. Chen, who previously served as District Sales Manager for the company's Northern California region, will assume his new role on November 1.

The appointment comes as part of Velocity Motors' regular organizational adjustments to support its dealer network across the western United States. Chen will report directly to National Sales Vice President Jennifer Rodriguez and will oversee relationships with approximately 85 dealerships in the four-state region.

"Marcus brings 12 years of automotive retail experience and a strong track record of dealer support to this position," said Rodriguez in a statement. "His understanding of our product lineup and dealer operations will help maintain continuity in the Southwest market."

Chen joined Velocity Motors in 2019 and has held various positions within the company's sales organization. Prior to joining VELO, he worked for two other automotive manufacturers in sales and marketing roles.

The Southwest region represents approximately 18% of Velocity Motors' U.S. sales volume, according to company data. The previous regional director, Patricia Hoffman, retired in September after 15 years with the company.

In related news, Velocity Motors confirmed it will participate in the upcoming National Automobile Dealers Association (NADA) Show in Las Vegas from January 23-26. The company plans to showcase its 2024 model lineup and host dealer training sessions during the event. VELO traditionally maintains a presence at major industry conferences as part of its dealer engagement strategy.

The company also announced plans to expand its certified pre-owned vehicle program with additional marketing support for participating dealers. The initiative includes updated point-of-sale materials and digital marketing assets that will be distributed to dealers beginning in December.

Velocity Motors, headquartered in Detroit, Michigan, designs, manufactures, and distributes vehicles through a network of approximately 400 dealerships across North America. The company's shares closed at $34.67 on Tuesday, down 0.3% for the day.
